attributes.action: dissolve parliament at the earliest opportunity and call a general election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Bearing in mind;

1. The disgraceful actions of a number of members of the house in feathering their own nests, in extremely dubious possibly illegal circumstances, at the expense of the citizens of the United Kingdom. 

2. The attempt by a number of members of the house the enact legislation to restrict the freedom of information act 2000, in order to hide potential embarrassment about nest feathering.

3. The attempt by the Prime Minister to conceal a report into the expenses of an alleged nest feathered.

4. The successful attempt by short sighted, self interested members of the house in rejecting a vote of confidence in the current government.

5. The abject failure of the Prime Minister to restore the confidence of the citizens of the United Kingdom in current elected members of the house.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
